AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02.synopsis: Vignette: The citizens have stopped at the street fork and are looking around. Are you sure this is the right place? I don’t think Firgaro’s boutique was in this part of town.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_0.speaker: Filson Vago
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_0.text: You're certain Figaro's is in this part of town?

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_2.speaker: Saer Drana Hoyte
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_2.text: I wouldn't say I'm certain. Just optimistic.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_2.context: NodeContext: Caught out, hedging her bets

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_1.speaker: Filson Vago
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_1.context: NodeContext: Already knows the answer - not impressed

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_6.speaker: Filson Vago
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_6.text: I'm going to ask for directions.
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_6.context: NodeContext: With a sigh - taking matters into his own hands

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_5.speaker: Saer Drana Hoyte
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_5.text: No, no - you mustn't! The city is full of criminals. We can't let them know we're vulnerable.

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_3.speaker: Saer Drana Hoyte
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_3.text: Fine. We'll just stand here until you remember the way, shall we?

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_8.speaker: Saer Drana Hoyte
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_8.text: Why don't we just retrace our steps?

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_4.speaker: Filson Vago
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_4.text: Great idea. Do you remember which way we came?

AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_7.speaker: Saer Drana Hoyte
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_7.text: Left, left, right, down the stairs and - or was it up the stairs?
AD_Citizen_01_Citizen_02_7.context: NodeContext: Reciting directions, losing confidence towards the end

Citizen_02_0.speaker: Saer Drana Hoyte
Citizen_02_0.text: I assure you. I know exactly where I am. No assistance needed.
Citizen_02_0.context: NodeContext: Nervous, feigning confidence - thinks you're going to rob her

Citizen_02_1.speaker: Saer Drana Hoyte
Citizen_02_1.text: We're not lost. Just taking in the view before continuing on our way.
Citizen_02_1.context: NodeContext: Nervous, feigning confidence - thinks you're going to rob her

Citizen_01_0.speaker: Filson Vago
Citizen_01_0.text: You again? You must be as lost as we are.

Citizen_01_1.speaker: Filson Vago
Citizen_01_1.text: The Lower City's a bloody warren. I'm surprised anyone can find their way around.
